X.i.6.E.1.b
.
MEBs
Medical evaluation boards (MEBs) are entities of the service department responsible for evaluating the disabilities of IDES participants for the purpose of
documenting medical status and duty limitations
determining whether the IDES participantsÂ meet medical retention standards, and
referring IDES participants to a PEB.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section E - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES), Referrals, and Initial Processing
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section E
